00027 #ifndef FORMATDATA_FLAGS_DEFINE_H_
00028 #define FORMATDATA_FLAGS_DEFINE_H_
00029 
00030 #include "gflags/gflags.h"
00031 
00032 DEFINE_int32(model,1,"Unigram-1 or some other model");
00033 DEFINE_string(corpus,"specify","A text file with space separated fields containing doc-id, category, contents of the doc");
00034 DEFINE_string(outputprefix,"lda", "A prefix that will be used with all files output by the program");
00035 DEFINE_string(dumpfile,"specify", "The dump of the dictionary to be used instead of creating afresh");
00036
